org.osmdroid.bonuspack.routing
Class GraphHopperRoadManager

java.lang.Object
  org.osmdroid.bonuspack.routing.RoadManager
      org.osmdroid.bonuspack.routing.GraphHopperRoadManager

public class GraphHopperRoadManager
extends RoadManager

get a route between a start and a destination point, going through a list of waypoints. It uses GraphHopper, an open source routing service based on OpenSteetMap data.
It requests by default the GraphHopper demo site. Use setService() to request another (for instance your own) GraphHopper-compliant service.

Author:
M.Kergall
See Also:
GraphHopper
